front.title: Addition of Camellia Elliptic Curve Cipher Suites with SHA-1 and SHA-2

abstract.t: This document specifies a set of elliptic curve cipher suites for theTransport Security Layer (TLS) protocol to support the Camelliaencryption algorithm as a block cipher. This document describessixteen new cipher suites for TLS that specify HMAC-SHA1 and HMAC-SHA2.
